Package com.example.project

Class LinearCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.project.LinearCalculator
  • public class LinearCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    A calculator to get information about two coordinates and the line formed between them

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LinearCalculator​(java.lang.String coord1, java.lang.String coord2)
      Creates a new LinearCalculator instance

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double distance()
      Calculates and returns the distance between the two points
      java.lang.String equation()
      Calculates and returns the equation of the line produced by the two points
      java.lang.String findSymmetry()
      Finds and returns the symmetry between the two points, if any

      Getter method for the x value of the first coordinate

      Getter method for the x value of the second coordinate

      • LinearCalculator

        public LinearCalculator​(java.lang.String coord1,
                        java.lang.String coord2)
        Creates a new LinearCalculator instance
        Parameters:
        coord1 - The first coordinate as a string (no spaces, ex: "(0,1)")
        coord2 - The second coordinate as a string (no spaces, ex: "(0,1)")

      • distance

        public double distance()
        Calculates and returns the distance between the two points
        Returns:
        The distance between the points, rounded to the nearest hundredth

      • yInt

        public double yInt()
        Calculates and returns the y-intercept of the line produced from the two points
        Returns:
        The y-intercept, rounded to the nearest hundredth, or -999.99 if undefined

      • slope

        public double slope()
        Calculates and returns the slope of the line produced from the two points
        Returns:
        The slope, rounded to the nearest hundredth, or -999.99 if undefined

      • equation

        public java.lang.String equation()
        Calculates and returns the equation of the line produced by the two points
        Returns:
        The equation of the line, in the form y=mx+b, or undefined if the slope is undefined

      • roundedToHundredth

        public double roundedToHundredth​(double x)
        Rounds the input to the nearest hundredth
        Parameters:
        x - The number to be rounded
        Returns:
        The rounded number

      • printInfo

        public java.lang.String printInfo()
        Returns information about the two points and the line produced

        Information returned:

        • The two points
        • The equation of the line produced
        • The slope of the line
        • The y-intercept of the line
        • The distance between the points
        • The symmetry between the points
        • The midpoint of the points
        Returns:
        The string containing the information

      • findSymmetry

        public java.lang.String findSymmetry()
        Finds and returns the symmetry between the two points, if any
        Returns:
        String showing if the points are symmetric or not

      • Midpoint

        public java.lang.String Midpoint()
        Finds and returns the midpoint of the two points, as a string
        Returns:
        A sentence showing the midpoint
